name: Get Robbie Home
description:
Get Robbie Home

Robbie was sent out from his home to find some colourful shizz. Finally Robbie the robot has found space flowers!! Now he needs to get home with one.

Can you help him? 

Hes got very limited energy so you've got to "make it count"! ;)

Controls
  • Use the SPACEBAR to jump between asteroids.
  • Hold down SPACEBAR to power up jump!
  • To direct Robbies jump aim the camera in the desired direction.
  • When floating between asteroids use the SPACEBAR to open Robbies solar panels.
  • Use the WASD keys to aim Robbies solar panels at the closest star so he can regain a little bit of energy.
